A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt this movie completely disrespected the original Star Wars characters and story. Luke was a completely different character in this movie and did things his original character would have never done in the original Star Wars trilogy. I thought the new story was terrible\, and I noticed many plot holes. I also noticed an anti-male undertone in the movie. I am a lifelong fan of George Lucas' Star Wars\, but I am not a fan of disney's new Star Wars. I have no interest in seeing Episode 9.
